SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.quests

Class AbstractQuest

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.quests.AbstractQuest
Direct Known Subclasses:
QuestBasic
public abstract class AbstractQuest extends Object
An abstract Quest class that contains the design for Quest classes that store quest and subtask progression (# of subtasks completed), descriptions and hints.
